name: auto-open-files
description: Automatically open related files based on configurable patterns

autoOpenFiles.enabled.description: Enable or disable auto-opening related files

autoOpenFiles.maxTab.description: Maximum number of tabs/columns to use (0 = unlimited)

autoOpenFiles.rules.description: Rules for automatically opening related files

triggerPattern.description: Regular expression pattern to match the opened file. Use capture groups for replacements.

openPattern.description: Pattern for the file to open. Use $1, $2, etc. to reference capture groups.

viewColumn.description: Where to open the related file

hasOppositeRule.description: When true will close the current file if in column 1

onlyIfMultipleTabs.description: Only open the file if multiple tabs/columns are already open
